genresAdvancedInfo.name: chinese folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Chinese folk music is a traditional genre that has been passed down for generations. It is characterized by its use of traditional Chinese instruments such as the erhu, pipa, and guzheng. The lyrics often depict stories of rural life, love, and nature. Chinese folk music is known for its soothing melodies and calming effect on the listener.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
